00046 template<class NodeData>
00047 inline const NodeData& TPolylineExNode<NodeData>::GetTNodeData(int nodeIndex) const
00048 {
00049        I_ASSERT(nodeIndex >= 0);
00050        I_ASSERT(nodeIndex < int(m_nodesData.size()));
00051 
00052        return m_nodesData[nodeIndex];
00053 }

00090 template<class NodeData>
00091 inline bool TPolylineExNode<NodeData>::InsertNode(const i2d::CVector2d& node)
00092 {
00093        m_nodesData.insert(m_nodesData.end(), NodeData());
00094 
00095        return BaseClass::InsertNode(node);
00096 }
00097 
00098 
00099 template<class NodeData>
00100 inline bool TPolylineExNode<NodeData>::InsertNode(int index, const i2d::CVector2d& node)
00101 {
00102        NodesData::iterator iter = m_nodesData.begin();
00103        iter += index;
00104        m_nodesData.insert(iter, NodeData());
00105 
00106        return BaseClass::InsertNode(index, node);
00107 }

00114        BaseClass::Clear();

00118 template<class NodeData>
00119 bool TPolylineExNode<NodeData>::RemoveNode(int index)
00120 {
00121        NodesData::iterator iter = m_nodesData.begin();
00122        iter += index;
00123        m_nodesData.erase(iter);
00124 
00125        return BaseClass::RemoveNode(index);
00126 }
